abstract: Environmental Protection Agency announces that it will devise stricter rules for the treatment and disposal of toxic wastewater used in the rapidly growing drilling tactic known as hydrofracking.
snippet: The Environmental Protection Agency announced Thursday that it planned to set standards by 2014 for the management of wastewater used in hydrofracking.
lead_paragraph: The Environmental Protection Agency announced Thursday that it planned to set standards by 2014 for the management of wastewater used in hydrofracking.

headline.main: E.P.A. to Tighten Rules on Wastewater Disposal
headline.print_headline: E.P.A. to Tighten Rules on Wastewater Disposal
